docs.lead_paragraph: Twice each month, after welfare checks are mailed out, the welfare centers in the city are often so crowded with worried recipients who did not receive their checks that the doors to reception rooms have to be locked to keep others from getting in to complain.

headline.main: Spiraling Welfare Costs: No End Is in Sight Here; Relief Cost Spiral Disturbs Many Here, but No One Predicts Improvement Soon

docs.abstract: discussion of city welfare crisis sees no end to spiraling pub assistance expenditures; illus
